definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
surname Kang/Kang, one of the 28 constellations
war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)

sentences.english: Resistant to blight, tolerate to re-plant and drought. Wide adaption.
sentences.chinese: 抗枯萎病能力強，耐重茬，耐旱，適應廣。

sentences.english: The hydraulic pressure revolution axis design thickens the plate, the anti-collision, is not easy to distort.
sentences.chinese: 液壓轉軸設計加厚板材，抗碰撞，不易變形。

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的熱穩定性，抗強鹼性及抗強溶劑性。

sentences.english: Conclusion These results suggest that benidipine is a safe and effective anti-hypertension drug.
sentences.chinese: 結論貝尼地平是一種安全有效的抗高血壓藥。

sentences.english: Objective To know the affection and related factors of neuroleptic to myocardial ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解抗精神病藥物的影響及相關因素。

sentences.english: Anti-Xa activity is an acceptable alternate method to monitor heparin therapy.
sentences.chinese: 抗X因子活性是可接受的檢測肝素治療的替代方法。

sentences.english: May potentiate oral anticoagulants, others that prolong bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 口服抗凝血劑，會增強，也有人認爲延長出血。

sentences.english: The study concludes that GM herbicide-resistant soybeans have not increased yields.
sentences.chinese: 該項研究結論，轉基因抗除草劑大豆並沒有增加產量。

sentences.english: The reshaping anti-CD28 single domain antibodies were constructed by using this method.
sentences.chinese: 利用該方法構建了改形抗CD28重鏈單域抗體。

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the anti-fatigue action of pseudo-ginsenoside GQ.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討僞人蔘皁苷GQ抗運動性疲勞的功效。

sentences.english: The oral drug is the first in an HIV drug class called integrase inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 這種新型的口服抗艾滋病毒藥物屬於整合酶抑制劑。

sentences.english: Salt tolerance and temperature resistance properties of this dipolymer were investigated preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 初步考察了該聚合物的耐鹽抗溫性能。

sentences.english: Researchers also need to study combinations of antiangiogenic drugs.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員也需要研究不同抗血管新生藥物的組合。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the biochemical mechanism of actions of Jiangguiyin capsules against myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究薑桂飲膠囊抗心肌缺血的生化機理。

sentences.english: So far, there has been no resistance to antileprosy treatment when used as MDT.
sentences.chinese: 迄今，對使用聯合化療的抗麻風治療無抗藥性。

sentences.english: The erosion resistance of HVOF-sprayed is enhanced with the temperature increasing.
sentences.chinese: 溫度升高，塗層的抗沖蝕性能提高。

definition: to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
to carry on one's shoulder/(fig.) to take on (a burden, duty etc)
to raise aloft with both hands/(of two or more people) to carry sth together
